ygData.subject: Re: Bard letter to GZ
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Males do a silly little hop when playing the flute.  Females kind of swing their head from side to side while shaking their torso.  By dance, people are
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 26 Sep 1999, Brangwen wrote:
> >
> >Female bards don't dance? Sure we do. If you mean when playing the
> flute...
> > This is why I have a mino horn, not a flute, because of that silly
> >marching/dance thingie.
>
> Well, I certainly don't do the dance. I was all excited about it when I got
> to 16, but to my dismay, I don't do the dance! :( I even left my computer

Males do a silly little hop when playing the flute. Females
kind of swing their head from side to side while shaking their
torso. By "dance," people are referring to the hop that the
males do.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
